title: Help to ID "Fresh California" typeface
content:
Anyone know what this "Fresh California" typeface is?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [FC\_small.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823084029/http:/typophile.com/files/FC_small.jpg) | 303.77 KB |
author: nicolasrandall

comments.content: Bookman Swash Itc T Medium Italic

[Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823084029/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/bookman) Italic with swash alternates. Have a look to Bookman re-interpretation by fellow Typophile Mark Simonson [Bookmania](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823084029/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania), it's full of swash alternates.
